data.message: What he doesn’t realize, is that America spoke and elected Trump. Obviously the NFL ratings wasn’t proof enough that we are the majority. We protest from home without damaging anything and get results. I’m disappointed. Eminem got me through a lot as a kid.

replies.message: Exactly we work don’t stand in Times Square on a Monday afternoon but come November we strike

Actually the dominant amount of people did not want Trump as their president. it's only due to the Electoral College that he won. The way districts are cut up in each state is to keep the Republicans even viable.
Matt Salem you're a clever cookie... If only some others understood how it worked, they'd be less convinced that he would have won, if the districts were weighted evenly...😉
